title: Comprehensive Fast processing using Asyncio
description: Quick note about aiofiles Ordinary local file IO is blocking, and cannot easily and portably made asynchronous. This means doing file IO may interfere with asyncio applications, which shouldn't block the executing thread. aiofiles helps with this by introducing asynchronous versions of files that support delegating operations to a separate thread pool.
description_lemmatized: quick note aiofiles ordinary local file io blocking cannot easily portably made asynchronous mean file io may interfere asyncio application shouldnt block executing thread aiofiles help introducing asynchronous version file support delegating operation separate thread pool
